text: welcome to daily video vocabulary a dose
of daily new English phrases and words
brought to you by let's talk podcast
calm
hello English learners welcome to daily
video vocabulary episode 20 today's new
word is pep talk so what do you mean by
pep talk let's find out and learn how to
use this word in your daily conversation
pep talk so when someone gives you a pep
talk it is to build you up to help you
accomplish something for example in
sports the coach might give a player a
pep talk before the game to boost his
confidence or at work the boss might
give you a pep talk to get you to do a
better job basically pep talk means a
short and encouraging speech that is
meant to help people do something faster
better or with more enthusiasm or you
can say a talk during which someone
encourages you to do something better or
work harder now let's look at some
example sentences using the word pep
talk
example 1 before every basketball game
the coach always gives his players a pep
talk to help them win the game in sport
pep talks are usually given just before
a competition or during an interval in
play this may help some performers to
reach an optimal level of performance
example to today's meeting about
employee benefit plan kept us up pep
talk inspires individuals and
organizations to positive actions for
growth example 3 Rahul Gandhi gave a pep
talk to new Congress youth activists and
asked them to work hard for the uplift
of the society
you
